188b6('dul ba): mjug bsgrubs shig ces smras pa dang / de'ang rab tu dad pa zhig ste/ bdag ni cher dad pa lags kyis/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis cher bskyed par bgyi'o// 
188b7('dul ba): zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de chung ngu bshig ste/ chen
188b8('dul ba): po byed nus na gnang gis byos shig/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ mchod rten dang gdugs rnyings shing zhig pa'ang de bzhin// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
189a1('dul ba): gzhan zhig gis gdugs phab nas slar ma bsgrubs kyi bar du dus 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rjes ma ma zin gyi bar du snga ma dbab par ma byed cig/ 
189a2('dul ba): de bzhin du sku gzugs 'jim pa la byas pa dag rnyings na/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ma byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dang 'dra ba 'am/ de las lhag par ni
189a3('dul ba): byos shig/ chung ngu na ma yin// de bzhin du ri mor bris pa dag kyang ri mo byed pa dang / dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ri mor ma bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed na de nyid
189a4('dul ba): kyi rgyu slar ris shig de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bka'i glegs bam dag byed par gyur pa na dge slong dag gis the tsom skyes nas ma bris pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
189a5('dul ba): bying na sangs rgyas kyi bka' slar ris ris shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshogasu pa cad pa bzhi pa'o// / bam po ni
189a6('dul ba): gcig pa// mdor na/ gsar bu 'jug par bya ba dang // 'khor rnams rnam pa lnga yis dang // yon dang snod dang rol mo dang // dge bsnyen dag ni bsgrags pa'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na
189a7('dul ba): ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la/ dus kyi mchod ston chen po dang bcas par byos la/ grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar gyis shig/ ces bka' stsal
189a8('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong dag gis sus bkur bar mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gzhon nu dag
189b1('dul ba): gis khyer cig par dka' stsal ba dang / de 'khor med par gyur pas na mi mdzes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge
189b2('dul ba): tshul dang / dge tshul ma'i 'khor lnga dang chos shig/ dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis yon dul na sus kyang ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
189b3('dul ba): dag gis blang bar byos shig/ gzhon nus blang ngam rgan po rnams kyis blang ba de dag gis ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po rnams kyis long shig/ bcom
189b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bkur ba dar byos shig dang / dge slong gnas brtan dag gis khyer te ngal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
189b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan dag gis bsrungs la/ gzhan gyis bkur bar gyis shig/ dge slong dgagis rol mo mi byed par dong ba dang / khyim bdag mgon me
189b6('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni/ sku gzugs gshegs pa'i tshe/ bdag gis rol mo sbyor zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag
189b7('dul ba): de ltar na gnang gis sbyor cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa btsun pa dge slong gis ro lo bgyir rung / u pa li mi rung // nam mchod pa'i dus
189b8('dul ba): na 'di skad du bzhin bzangs ston pa la mchod par byos shig ces bsgo shig/ rkyang pa'i bsgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa lnga pa'o// mdor na// sgrogs par byed dang sdod/ 
190a1('dul ba): sbed dang / shing rta tha dad byed pa dang // snod rnams bged pa dang pa dang // mdo'i tshogasu bcad par brjod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med pas
190a2('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ston chen po gyis la/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib man bzhugs pa'i sku'i gzugs grong khyer du gshegs pa rgyas par byos/ 
190a3('dul ba): shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag la ma sbran par dong ngo // de dag gis e ma'o 'phags pa dag nged cag la sngar sbran na ni nged kyis yon
190a4('dul ba): rnams sta gon bya ba zhig ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang nga / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag bdun
190a5('dul ba): nam brgyad kyi snga rol nas/ dus kyi mchod ston chen po bye zhes grong khyer dang tshong dus dang / srang dang lam dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrags par byos
190a6('dul ba): shig/ de dag gis dus ston zhes bsgrags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag dus thob la zhag 'od snyed cig na dus ston byed zhes sbron cig/ de ltar byas kyang 'di
190a7('dul ba): rten thams cad kyis ma thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gro ba la ris la bal glang gi steng du zhon te tshong dus dang srang dang / lam dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrag
190a8('dul ba): par gyis shig/ gang gi nyin mo/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dus ston chen po byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan dang / gnas brtan dag gis ni yon rnams bsrungs shig/ 
190b1('dul ba): gnon rnams kyis khyer cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / des khyer te bab rab tu bor ba dang / ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod spyad
190b2('dul ba): sbed pa'i dge slong skos shig/ bsgo ba ni 'di ltar bsko'o// stan thing la gaN+DI rdungs te/ dris pa la lan ldon pa'i dge slong ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshogs ga
190b3('dul ba): 'khod pa dang / sngar ni dad par byos shig/ khyod ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par bskon dang dam zhes dri ste/ dad na des kyang dad do zhes smros shig/ de'i 'og tu dge
190b4('dul ba): slong cig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par dang na/ de sde dge 'dun gyis
190b5('dul ba): dus la bab shing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnod shigamong 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed par bskos te/ snod/ smad pa ming 'di zhe gyis dge 'dun gyi snod sbed de/ 'di ni
190b6('dul ba): gsol ba'o// las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams ming 'di zhes byab 'i dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par dad de/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi
190b7('dul ba): ba 'di snod sbed par bskos te/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod sbed na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed du bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
190b8('dul ba): gsung shig/ gang gi mi bzod pa de dag ni smros shig/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbed par bskos te/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na cang mi gsung ste/ de de
191a1('dul ba): bzhin du 'dzin to// der yang rnyed pa dag mang du byung nas/ dge slong dag gis 'phags pa bdag cag la rnyed pa'i skal pa stsol cig ces smras kyang / dge slong dag
191a2('dul ba): gis ma byin// de dag gis phyi de nyin mo shing rta gzhan zhig bshams pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag gis 'phags ma dag shing rta 'di nyid dam/ 'on te gzhan zhig ces dris nas/ 
191a3('dul ba): dge slong ma dag gis kyang rnyed pa mang du gyur to// dge slong ma dag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti la ngom par gyur pa dge slong dag gis mthong nas/ 'phags pa khyod kyis kho mo cag la rnyed par
191a4('dul ba): ma byin mod kyi bdag cag gis kyang shing rta logs shig tu bshams pas bdag cag la rnyed pa yang mang du thob par gyur to// smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge
191a5('dul ba): slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'a// des kyis dgongs pa dge slong dag gang nyes pa'i dam gsu gyur pa ni dge slong ma dag gis dus ston gyi tshe/ shing / 
191a6('dul ba): rta gud du bshams pas de bas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dog gis shing rta logs shig tu mi bshams par dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
191a7('dul ba): dag dge slong mas mi rigs pa byas te/ de bas na dge slong mas dus ston gyi tshe shing lta logs shig tu ma shom cig/ dge slong ma dag gi dus ston gyi tshe shing lta legs shig tu
191a8('dul ba): bshams na dbyen byas pa dang / nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyuraro// snod de dag de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gos
191b1('dul ba): shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis ji ltar bsgo ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod 'ged pa'i dge slong cig sko shig/ bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya'o// stan
191b2('dul ba): thing ste gaN+DI rdungs la dris pa la lan ldon pa'i dge slong bskos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod pa dang sngar dad pa byos shig/ khyod dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged par bsko na dad dam zhes dris
191b3('dul ba): la/ de ste dad do zhes zer na de'i 'og tu dge slong cig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams snod 'ged pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod
191b4('dul ba): 'ged par dad na de ste dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing dbazod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnod la dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod 'ged par skos shig/ mi
191b5('dul ba): 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged/ 'di ni gsol kha'o las kyang 'di ltar byos shig/ gson cigabatsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod 'ge
191b6('dul ba): par dad na/ dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged de dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged par tshe dang ldan pa rnams bzod pa ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang mi bzod pa de dag ni
191b7('dul ba): smos shig/ dge 'dun gyi ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod 'ged par bskos te/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na/ cang mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin du 'dzin te/ rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis
191b8('dul ba): kyi mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa drug pa'o// // mdo bar ma ste/ rnam pa tha dad byad dang yon// gang gi tshe na gcig las lhag/ gang gi tshe na gnyis la gcig/ bdag gir bya bar
192a1('dul ba): mi rung ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// gang gi tshe dus ston chen po byung ba na
192a2('dul ba): rnyed pa mang po dang ldan par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba'i thabs mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos sbed pa'i dge slong gis stan thing la gaN+DI
192a3('dul ba): brdungs te dris pa la lan ldon pa'i dge slong bskos la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing khod pa'i nang du bcod par bya'o// de dag gis sus rin thang gdab pa ma shes nas
192a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis thob shig/ de dag gis de nyi du nyor bcug pa dang / de nyid la nyor ma gzhug shig/ dge
192a5('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis rin cher btab ste/ sus kyang mnyos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ cher ma gdab shig ces gsungs pa dang / 
192a6('dul ba): shin tu chung ngu btab po// shin tu chung ngur yang ma gdab par ran par thob shig/ gang gis thog mar rin skyed pa de nyid nyor chug shig ces smras pa dang / de la ma btsong par gang
192a7('dul ba): gi tshe/ rin thang sus kyang ma bskyed na/ gdod de nyid la chongs shig/ drug sde dag gis rin chen btab ste/ rin blangs na dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir nged kyis rin thang bskyedo zhes smras
192a8('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang nyo ba des rin tha bskyed cig/ gzhan gyis rin thang bskyed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// drug sde dag gis rin thang bskyed
192b1('dul ba): denyos nas bkrus shing bgos// rin len pa la de nyid slar byin// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin 'ongs kyis bar du de la ma byin cig/ rin ma byin par bgos na 'das pa dang / 
192b2('dul ba): bcas par 'gyur// rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa bdun pa'o// / mdor na/ gtsug lag khang ni zhig pa ste// lci ba'i phyir ni gzhig par bya// nam zhig 'jig
192b3('dul ba): par gyur pa na// skad cig brnye ba dge 'dun gyi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag
192b4('dul ba): gnas khang lnga rtseg tu byos shig/ dri gtsang khang ni bdun rtseg / sgo khang yang bdun rtseg tu byos shig/ ces bka' stsa dal to// dge slong ma'i gnas khang ni sum rtseg go// dri gtsang
192b5('dul ba): kha ni lnga rtse go/ sgo khang yang lnga rtse go/ steng gi lcid kyis rtsig pa 'jig du byed de/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnam kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
192b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng ma'i rim cig pri cig/ 'on kyang 'jig par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rim pa gnyis nas bzhi'i bar du phri la 'og khang gcig
192b7('dul ba): pubu zhog cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa'i na ste/ dge slong rnams la 'jigs pa dag byung nas/ gtsug lag khang stong par byas te/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan yang bor nas bros te dong pa dang / 
192b8('dul ba): ma khyen par len bdag gis bskuso// brkus pas dge slong dag phongs par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
193a1('dul ba): sprul pa/ dge 'dun gyil la stan por te ma'ang shig/ gang du 'dong ba der khyer cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du 'dong par bye cig/ ces dka' stsal pa/ dge na
193a2('dul ba): zhig gis bgo ba dag khyer te dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bros te dong ba dang / de na nub mo dge slong zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi nang na rgan te ji ltar rgan rim su dpa'o zhes smras par
193a3('dul ba): de byin no// des de byin nas ji tsam nam nangs pa dang / des bsgo ba 'di khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gang gi tshe bgo bar bgos pa de'i tshe na ni khyed rgan pos khyer la
193a4('dul ba): da bkur ba'i tshe na ni nga la sbyin nam// khyed nyid khyer cig/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la ga sol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
193a5('dul ba): gang gis 'jigs pa'i tshe khyer ba de de nyid kyi'o// gang gi tshe 'jigs pa med par gyur na yang / bcomaldan 'das kyis gnango zhes slar ma phul ba dang / de ltar
193a6('dul ba): gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag re shig ngas dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag gnang gis/ gtan du ni
193a7('dul ba): ma yin gyi/ 'jigs pa dang bral na slar phul la rgan rim su byin cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshogasu bcad pa brgyad pa'o// / mdor na/ 
193a8('dul ba): ta'i tshal du mchod ston tshe// rnga chen gyis ni 'du bar bya// gral ni 'chol bar 'khod pa dang // dge slong las ni zhal tar bsko// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i/ 
193b1('dul ba): dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la de ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag
193b2('dul ba): gis dus ston chen po'i bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag ngas gnang gis byos shig/ de dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas pa
193b3('dul ba): dang / dge slong mang po 'dus par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod ston chen po byed pa nagaN+DI dang rnga dang dung bus shig dang / dge slong dag gdugs
193b4('dul ba): tshod la bab par dus rig par 'gyu ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag rnga dag gi sgras brdegs na 'tshol b.ra'akhod do// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
193b5('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong las zhal tab bsgo sa te/ ci nas rgan rim su khod pa dang / nam zas
193b6('dul ba): dag rgan rims nas brims te/ gzhon nu'i gan du phyin tsam nas gdugs tshod kyang yol te/ dge slong dag zas kyi bar chad du gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom
193b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya phreng du gyis la/ kha zas ni rgan rims kyi mdun du zhog shig/ dge slong dag gis de bzhin du
193b8('dul ba): byas pa dang / khyim bdag ni bza' ba dag 'drim pa la rku'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'drim
194a1('dul ba): pa'i spyan dge slong bskos shig/ de dag kyang kha zas kyi bar chad du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de dag sngar ban byin la phyis zhal ta byed du chug
194a2('dul ba): shig/ rkyang ba'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa dgu pa'o// / mdor na/ dge slong ma ni mang du gyur// dge slong dang pos rjes yi rang // gcig dang ga ni
194a3('dul ba): dang mang po dang // bu chung rab tu dag gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na/ khyim
194a4('dul ba): bdag zhig gnas pa des dge slong ma mang zhig bshos la spyan drangs pa dang / ji tsam zhig na/ dge slong gcig cig 'dron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brag
194a5('dul ba): kyi grong der phyin pa dang / de der bsod snyoms la zhug na de na gzhan zhig gis de la 'phags pa khyim 'di na dge slong ma dag bshos gsol zhing 'khod kyis der
194a6('dul ba): bzhud cig ces smras pa dang / de'ang der song na dge 'dun ma'i gnas brtan sbomo dga' ldan 'dug ste/ des 'phags pa de ste sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod nus na ni rgan rim su bzhugs
194a7('dul ba): shig/ de ste mi nus na ni phyogs gcig tu bshos bsnams la bzhud cig ces smras pa dang / de skyed nas des bsams pa/ de ste bdag gis sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod kyi bar du 'dus
194a8('dul ba): na 'dron pa mang po dag kyang dong par 'gyur gyis phyogs gcig tu zan zos te 'gro'o snyam nas phyogs gcig tu zan zos te song ngo // rims bzhin du mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / 
194b1('dul ba): dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'ongs sam/ ci bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ ga la zhig bde bar spyad/ dge slong ma la rgyal ka byaso// de
194b2('dul ba): ltar byas zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa rgyas par dge slong dag la smraso// dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
194b3('dul ba): pagang na dge slong gcig dang / dge slong ma gcig ba de na dge slong de gral yang dang po// chu yang dang po// zan yang dang por zo shig/ gang na dge slong ma gnyis sam/ gsum
194b4('dul ba): 'am/ de las kyang lhag pa zhig la// dge slong gcig/ cig 'ongs na/ dge slong gcig pu de lta na yang dang po// chu yang dang po// zan yang dang por zo shig/ 
194b5('dul ba): gang de ste dge slong ma dag 'ba' zhig na yang rtag tu gral gyi dang / bor stan cig lhag par zhog la 'khod cig/ de ste/ dge tshul zhig 'ongs na/ yang de der 'dug la zo shig de ste
194b6('dul ba): des mi nus par gyur na yang dge slong mas sbyin pa'i yon tan lhogs shig/ dge slong mas de ltar ma byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim
194b7('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas/ dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas nas/ bu dang chung ma dge 'dun la yon du phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/ 
194b8('dul ba): de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la dris shig/ dris pa dang / pha des smras pa/ 'phags pa
195a1('dul ba): dag ring chod cig dang bdag gis glung gsolo// drug sde dag gis de la 'gran cing spel ba la zhugs pa dang / de'i nang nas chung ma bu chung ngu can gyis khyim bdag
195a2('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi rkang pa la btude/ jo bo bdag gi bu chung gis bdag ma btang shig ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / 
195a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sems can gyi nang na bud med las snying chung pa med kyis/ 'jigs par ma bya shig/ de bas na dge slong gis bud med kyi rin thang ma
195a4('dul ba): gcod cig/ bcad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur// / sbyin pag/ ji ltar dga' zhing dga' ste byin pa bzhin du long shig/ rkyang pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa bcu pa rdzog so// 
195a5('dul ba): mdor na sdus par na/ yo byad bus pa blun pa dang // gang gi ba dang de yi ste// de ltar khye'u las bslang ma bya// mgon med zas sbyin de bzhin te// spu yi gri dang
195a6('dul ba): 'khor rnams dang // chu dang sdus par gsungs pa'o// mdor na/ yo byad rnams dang gnang ba dang // u pa lis ni dris pa ste// ji ltar byin gyis brlabs par bya// yid bcugs
195a7('dul ba): tshigs bcad mdor gsungs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// dge slong dag ljongs rgyab
195a8('dul ba): spyod pas na na bar gyur te/ kha cig la sman med nas lhung bzed btsongs kyang khyim bdag gis ma nyos nas dus 'das par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
195b1('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis yo byad dang gos chongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad dang / gos chongs shig ces
195b2('dul ba): gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis dkrus nas kha bsgyur te bcangs pa dang rin chung ngur gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bkrus kham bsgyur/ sar pa btags
195b3('dul ba): ma thag chongs shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis yo byad bcu gsum chongs shig ces bka'/ 
195b4('dul ba): stsal na/ ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li so sor byin gyis brlabs par bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni sbyar mar byin gyis brlabs par bya ste/ bya ba zin pa yongasu spyad
195b5('dul ba): pa'o// de bzhin du stod g.yogs dang / mthang gos dang / shams thabs dang / sham thabs kyi 'theb dang / stong shags dang / stong shags kyi 'theb dang / gdong phyis
195b6('dul ba): dang lus phyis dang / g.yan pa'i gos dang / skra bzed dang / g.yogs ma dang / gos 'di ni yo byad kyi gosu byin gyis brlabs te/ na ba la dgos te/ bdag dang tshangs par spyod pa'i phyir byin
195b7('dul ba): gyis brlabs po// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsum byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka' stsal na/ 
195b8('dul ba): de las lhag pa'i gos rnams ji ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa li de ni slob dpon dang mkhan po dang / yid bcugs pa rnams la bsngos la bcang bar bya ste/ de
196a1('dul ba): yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya ste/ dge slong cig gi mdun du 'dug la 'di skad spros shig/ dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gos 'di lhag par bsngo ste/ @
196a2('dul ba): ba'i rigs pas ni mkhan po la bsngo ste/ mkhan po la yid bcugs pas bcing bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis gsum du brjod par bya'o// rkyang pa'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo
196a3('dul ba): tshig su bcad pa dang po'o// / mdor na/ bus pa blun la sogs pa shes// bcu gnyis kyi ni gang zag dang // de bzhin rnam par dbye ba dang // tshul bzhin pa ni gsum
196a4('dul ba): pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i da tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus/ 
196a5('dul ba): pa btsun pa gang zag du'i bslar bzlog pa mi bcan bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ u ba li bcug nyis te/ bus pa dang blun po dang mi gsal ba dang / 
196a6('dul ba): mkhas pa dang ngo tsha med dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa dang / spangs pa dang / tshig mi brtan pa dang / spyod lam las gal ba dang / tshul bzhin du mi
196a7('dul ba): gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o// yang nus pa/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na byis pa lta bu nas/ ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal pa'i bar du lags/ u pa li gang log par bsam pa sems
196a8('dul ba): ba dang / log par smra bsla ba dang / bzlog dka' ba bzlog pa yin na ni/ u ba li de ltar na byis par 'gyuraro// btsun pa ci tsam gyis na glen pa lags/ mdo sde mi 'dzin pa/ 'bub ba mi 'dzin pa
196b1('dul ba): ma lta bu mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u ba li glen pa yino// btsun pa ji tsam gyis mi gsal ba lags/ u pa li mdo sde yang 'dzin/ 'dul ba yang 'dzin/ ma lta bu yang 'dzin mod kyi/ 
196b2('dul ba): 'on kyang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa'i don mi shes pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na u pa li mi gsal ba yino// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mi mkhas pa lags/ u pa li gang mdo sde dang
196b3('dul ba): 'dul ba dang / ma lta bu yang 'dzin/ de dag gi don kyang shes mod kyi gzhan shes par byed mi nus pa ni/ u pa li mi mkhas pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na/ u pa li mi mkhas pa yin no// / 
196b4('dul ba): btsun pa ji tsam gyis na/ ngo tsha med pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ste/ u pa li de ni ngo tsha med par gyur pa'o// btsun
196b5('dul ba): baji tsam gyis na 'khon du 'dzin pa lags u pa li de ni khro ba dang 'thab mo dang / gzhan yang gang dang gang du' thab pa'i sgor gyur pa ste/ u pa li de tsam gyis na 'khon du
196b6('dul ba): 'dzin pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa lags de ni u pa li dge slong gi mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa ste/ ud pa li de tsam gyis na mtshams kyi phyi rol
196b7('dul ba): na 'dug pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na spangs pa lags ud pa li de ni dge 'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa ste/ ud pa li de tsam gyis na spangs par gyur pa zhes
196b8('dul ba): bya'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis ni tshig mi brtan par gyur pa lags u pa li de ni tshig mi brtan par gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal
197a1('dul ba): bar smra ba'o// u pa li de tsam gyis na tshig mi brtan par gyur pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam na spyod lam gal bar gyur pa lags/ u ba li de ni dge 'dun gyi nang
197a2('dul ba): nas langs nas song ba'o// u pa li de ltar na spyod lam las 'gal bar gyur pa'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li de ni mi
197a3('dul ba): spyod pa ni spyod/ dge slong gi bslab pa ni mi slob pa'o// u pa li de tsam gyis na tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa ji tsam gyis na bslab pa stsal bar gyur/ 
197a4('dul ba): pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li de ni dge slong la dge 'dun gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa byin par gyur pa ste/ u pa li de lta bu ni bslab pa byin par
197a5('dul ba): gyur pa'o// yang gsol pa btsun pa ji tsam gyi na gang zag gis slar bzlog pa la btsan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa li rnam
197a6('dul ba): pa gsum te/ tshul bzhin la gnas pa dang / tshigs bstan pa dang / spyod lam las ma gal ba'o// rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// / 
197a7('dul ba): mdor na/ gang gi phyir ni bya ba dang // gang zag kyang ni bcu gnyis te// bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang // khyim pa yin par khas blangs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
197a8('dul ba): dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ud pa lis zhus pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya/ 
197b1('dul ba): bde'i skur bzlog pa mi btsano zhes bka' stsal pa/ btsun pa gang zag bcu gnyis so sor bskor ba'i tshe de dag 'di skad mchi ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nged cag la ni ma bsko shig ces mchi
197b2('dul ba): na/ ci de dag gi slar bzlog pa yang mi btsan nam u pa li btsano// de ni chad pa'i las langs dgongs te gsungaso// btsun pa bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa khyim pa lags
197b3('dul ba): bar khas blangs na bsnyen par rdzogs par zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi u pa li bsnyen par rdzogs zin kyang / khyim pa yin pas khas blangs na/ de/ 
197b4('dul ba): yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs zhes bya na bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa gsum pa'o// 
197b5('dul ba): mdor na/ tshil bu dag ni mi rung ba// lnga pa gang gis rkang mi bsku// dbang phyugs bsgrags par bya ba da / zhing gi dngos po dge 'dun gyi'o// sangs rgyas
197b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga'i lham ma 'chang cig ces bka' stsal
197b7('dul ba): pa dang / drug sde dag gis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga po de dag gi tshil bus rkang pa byugs nas/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bal glang gi drung du song ste/ rdzi phyogs su
197b8('dul ba): 'khod pa dang / bal glang dag gis dri tshor nas bros pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag zung shig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis gzung bar
198a1('dul ba): mi nus so// bzhin bzangs nged kyis bzung ngam/ 'phags pa dag zung shig/ nged la ci sbyin/ bca' ba'i rino// des de dag gis mdun du song ste/ rdza ma
198a2('dul ba): ldang ba'i phyogasu 'dug pa dang / bal glang de dag kyang 'khod do// de dag gis smras pa 'phags pa dag ci khyed rig pa mkhyen tam/ bzhin bzangs nged rig pa mi shes mod kyi/ nged kyi
198a3('dul ba): bal glang cang shes kyi tshil bus rkang pa bskus paso// 'phags pa dag rgyal po'i bal blang mchog dag bros par gyur na/ khyod kyis rgyal po la gnod pa byas par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras nas
198a4('dul ba): de dag nyes pa dor brjod cing phyas 'dogs te mi snyan par ze ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'ad das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
198a5('dul ba): dge slong dag gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis rkang byug par ma byed cig/ dge slong gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis rkang pa la byugs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
198a6('dul ba): ro// ji ltar bal glang cang shes pa bzhin du/ rta cang shes dang / seng ge dang / stag dang gzigs la sogs pargyas par brjod par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/ de nas rgyal
198a7('dul ba): po gzugs can snying po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na bar song ste drung du phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs
198a8('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras// 'phags pa kun dga' bo seng ge'i gdan bshams pa 'di ci zhig bgyi/ ci dang chos
198b1('dul ba): bsgrags sam/ de'i tshigs sbyin gyi dus la bab ste/ des rgyal po chen po dge slong gis mtshungs par bzung ba las lags kyi/ khyim pas mtshungs par bzung ba ma lags zhes smras/ 
198b2('dul ba): pa dang / rgyal po rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo // mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ci'i phyir
198b3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po chos mnyan par song zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis nyes// 
198b4('dul ba): de ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po so sor thar pa thos pa/ ra gyur na/ nges par de sngon pas kyang mngon du dga' bar gyur te/ dga' nas dga' ba'i dbang gis bya ba byed du
198b5('dul ba): gdon ma pa'o// de bas na ngas gnang gis 'di 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa dang ba de dag la ni thos par gyis shig / gzhan yang rab tu phyug la ma dang dngul la rab tu dad de/ bcom
198b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de lta bu dag la'ang thos par gyis shig/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya'u bseng bseng po skye ma zhing rid la rmya zhing lus nyams
198b7('dul ba): chung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo ci'i phyir na gro zhin bye ba nyi shu zhes bya ba skya'u bseng bsed
198b8('dul ba): po skyes zhing ring la rgya zhing nyam chung bar gyur/ des bcom ldan 'das de dang po btsas nas thug pa 'ba' shig gis lus bskyed pa lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
199a1('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo de ltar nangs gnang gis gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa la thug pa lud cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gre zhin bya ba nyi shu pa la tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin bcom
199a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis/ khyod ni thug pa 'thung shig par gnong zhes bsgo ba dang / des smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag gcig pu la 'am/ de ste dge 'dun thams cad des smras pa khyod
199a3('dul ba): gcig pu'o// btsun pa kun dga' 'dis glengs pa na/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis kyang 'di skad du gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa bstan pa la rab tu byung ba/ sngon grong khyer tsam pa na lo
199a4('dul ba): legs par gyur pa'i tshebal glang bdun gyis drang ba spangs te/ rab tu byung nas/ da thug pa tsam la yang chagaso zhes zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phyir
199a5('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa gnang na/ bdag kyang bzod 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes gsol ba dang / de ltaragyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// 
199a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gnang gis/ gro zhin bye ba nyi shu pa'i phyir dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa 'thung shig/ gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po// bcom lda
199a7('dul ba): 'das kyis dge 'dun rnams thug pa 'thung bar gnango zhes thos nas des dge 'dun la sa bon bum pa stong gis gdab pa'i zhing dag phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan// 
199a8('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir blang bar bya ste/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ de bas na zhing las byung ba'i rnams dge 'dun gyis spyad par gyis shig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum
199b1('dul ba): pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa bzhi pa'o// // mdor na/ gding dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dang // dge tshul pa dang gsar bu dang // snyoms zhugs dang ni mi
199b2('dul ba): gnang ba// bslab pa byin pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// sangs rgyas bcom
199b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong dang khyim pa gnyis lhan cig tu gding ba gcig la mchis su rung ngam/ u pa li de ni mi rung mod kyi/ de lta
199b4('dul ba): bu'i rkyen cig byung na gan // btsun pa dge tshul pa dang /  dge slong gsar bu dang ma ning dang za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha bsad pa dang / ma bas
199b5('dul ba): ba dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun
199b6('dul ba): gnas dang / so sor gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dag la sogs pa dang gding ba gcig gi steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ u pa li de ltar ni mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gci
199b7('dul ba): byung na/ de bzhin du stan cig gam/ khri gcig gam/ khri'u gcig gam/ par btang gcig tu rung ngam/ mi rung mod kyi de lta bu'i rkyen gcig byung na rung // btsun pa khyim
199b8('dul ba): ba dang / stegs bu la stan bting ba'i steng na lha cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na rung // par btang dag gding yang mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen
200a1('dul ba): gardzun pa nga dag cing bar gyur pa de bzhin// de bzhin du duge tshul pa dang / dge slong gas dus/ mas gnas pa'i ba ste/ de ban
200a2('dul ba): dru gnas la/ nyes pa'i dmi gsum drung gis par du lhan cig 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur// btsun pa bsrab bstsal ba gnyis shig san gcig gi slong na ldan ce
200a3('dul ba): suM rung ma/ u ba 'i don mi // rlung ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad balnga ba'o// / dam po ni gnyis pa// mngongan mi 'as/ 
200a4('dul ba): pa dang khri'u gcig/ brel par gyur pa'ang de bzhin te// chung zad brel bar gyur pa dang // rtswa dang shing ya dang dge 'dun gyi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma
200a5('dul ba): du yod pa'i dzata'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun du ra ban bzhugs pa'i tshe/ dge slong dag wa~M 'u'i steng ni ba tse brag gi las byed cing 'dug pa dang / dru/ 
200a6('dul ba): rdzi dag de nyid 'dug cing gnod par byed de dag brel bzhin du bsrung ba dang / de dag la gnod par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gci
200a7('dul ba): bdeng bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong bco glag gis las byed cing brel pa la dge slong dag gis ma blang shig/ bslangs na 'das pa dang bcas par
200a8('dul ba): 'gyu'o/ gleng gzhin mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag zan pa zhing 'khod pa rnams la drug sde dag gis nan rims bzhin du bya'i zhes bslang ba dang / dge slong dag ldang dum tus
200b1('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar rgan rims bzhin du 'dug shig ces bka' stsal pa dang
200b2('dul ba): drug sde dag phyis 'ongs nas dge slong snga ma zas za zhing brel ba dag bslang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong zan za zhing brel pa
200b3('dul ba): dag ma blang bar gud du 'dug par bya ste/ bslangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa btsun pa ji tsam gyis
200b4('dul ba): dge slong dag zan za zhing brel ba zhes bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chung ngu dalan tshwa'am shang tse'am la phug kyang rung / brims par
200b5('dul ba): gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong zan za zhing brel ba la ma bslang shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag rgan rims kyis dang por 'dug nas/ 
200b6('dul ba): zan za zhing ched du brel bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag gis gral ma yin par 'dug pa la zan za zhing brel bar ma byed cig/ byis na
200b7('dul ba): 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// dge slong dag gral rims la mkhas par gyis shig/ de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi bum pa
200b8('dul ba): dang / gnong khung dag/ dge slong dag gis drangs nas gtso brag gi las byed pa dang / drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag ded rgan pas deng sngar dpa'i zhes smras nas/ tshon ci dag po ste khyer
201a1('dul ba): ba dang dge slong dag brel bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / dge slong dag gis bum pa 'am gzhung
201a2('dul ba): khung dag brel ba la ma blang bar bya ba rnams zin nas gdod long shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis bum pa 'am gzhong khung dag brel pa la ma blangs shig/ zhes bka'
201a3('dul ba): stsal pa drug sde dag gis bsams bzhin du snod rnams tshon chung zad tsam gyi brel bar byas te bzhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon rtsi thams cad
201a4('dul ba): snod gcig cig nang du blugs la dgos na blang bar gyis shig/ dge slong gis snod dag gi nang du tshon rtsi chung zad de kyis brel bar byas te ma bzhag shig/ bzhag na 'das
201a5('dul ba): pa dang bcas par 'gyur// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dzi ta'i tshal shing thags kyis bskor ba dang / khyim bdag
201a6('dul ba): dag gis bcag cing bcag cing khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bkur shig ces sgo shig/ de dag dag gis bsgo ba dang / shing dang rtsa yang bor te dong ngo // de dag/ 
201a7('dul ba): chud zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyad du mi rung ba dag ni tshang mang du skyol cig/ lhag ma dag ni las gsar du byed pa la phul cig/ drug sde dag gis las
201a8('dul ba): gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag gshags nas mer bus te btso blag gi las byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag ni ma bud cig/ 
201b1('dul ba): bus na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad ba drug pa'o// / mdor na/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi rgyan dang // 'du
201b2('dul ba): ba bslang ba mi bya dang // snod spyad lag na thogs pa dang // lham yang phyi bar bya ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
201b3('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis dze ti'i tshal yang dbul bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / 
201b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag ngas gnang gris phul cig nges shing gang pho'i ming du bya ba la ni pho'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ gang mo'i ming du bya ba ni me'i rgyan gyis brgyan
201b5('dul ba): ba dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
201b6('dul ba): khyim bdag nyid la dris shig/ de dag gis khyim bdag nyid la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa ji ltar sngos pa de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
201b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang shing pho'i ming du bya ba dang / gang shing mo'i ming bya ba rnams kyi rgyan so sor bsdus la thum por byos te zhog
201b8('dul ba): shig/ nam dus ston gyi tshe yang de bzhin du rgyan par gyis shig/ rtsig pa'i ni ri mo'i yo byad du byos shig/ bsro khang gi rtsig pa dang ka bdag gi ni las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge
202a1('dul ba): 'dun gyi snang mar byos shig/ nang pa'i sman khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i de dag ni las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i sman gyi yo byad du byos shig/ tshang
202a2('dul ba): mang gi rtsig pa dang ka pa'i ni de dag las gsar du byos shig/ de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun gyis bshosu gyis shig/ chu khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka pa'i ni de'i las gsar du byos shig/ de'i
202a3('dul ba): sa'i ni skom du rims shig/ dugs khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i ni de'i las gsar du gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni dugs khang du gyis shig/ bkad sa'i khang pa'i rtsig pa dang ka bdag ni las gsar du
202a4('dul ba): gyis shig/ de'i sa'i ni snum pa'i zong gyis shig/ khyams dang / stegs bu dang / 'chags dang / sgo khang dang / yang thog gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gi ni las gsar du gyis shig/ 
202a5('dul ba): de'i sa'i ni dge 'dun spyi bor gos shig/ gang rdzing bu'i ba des ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sbyar zhogashig/ dge slong spang ba'i khang bu'i nang na 'dug cing dge ba'i phyog
202a6('dul ba): spyod pa dang drug sde dag dor 'ongs nas ngad rga no zhes zer nas de dag bslangs te gtang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan rim so zhes dge slong gis dge slong 'khod pa la ma slang
202a7('dul ba): shig/ bslangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// dge slong dag bya ba byas nas stan las langs te/ 'chag cing 'dug bzhin du gzhan gyis stan blangs na ma ster nas/ dge slong dag
202a8('dul ba): brel par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bya ba byas nas stan las langs nas stan ma 'dzin
202b1('dul ba): cig/ dge slong dag ring zhig tu stan la 'dug nas langs te 'chag pa dang / de'i sar drug sde dag 'dug nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / 
202b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der ma 'dug shig/ langs te 'chag tu 'gro na yang de'i steng du chos gos sam pus khyud cig zhog la tshogs shig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ 
202b3('dul ba): dge slong dag snod rnams thogs bzhin du btsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / de nas dge slong cig gis thogs bzhin du phyag byas pa dang / de'i ril ba chags par gyur to// gzhan zhig gi/ 
202b4('dul ba): kyang khang bzangs kyis ka ba la lham brdabs pa dang / dge slong dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dag slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
202b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bca'o// dge slong lam du 'jug pas chu mthong na lhung bzed dang chos gos
202b6('dul ba): phog ste phyogs gcig tu zhog la/ de nas gos dag kyang sprugs te khrus byos la/ de nas rkang pa dang lag pa khrus la chu yang chu tshags kyis tshogs te rang gsher bas lham phyis la/ de'i
202b7('dul ba): 'og tu lag pa bsnyal ba nas/ bla 'og gi bgo ba legs par gyon la spyod lam zhi bzhin du btsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o// de las gzhan du na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 
202b8('dul ba): rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa bdun pa'o// // mdor na/ spu gri gdar dang sen mo bcad// smang tshar rkang pa'i rten dang ni// bshang bar bya dang / 
203a1('dul ba): gci ba'i gnas// bya ba byas pa mi bcang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// 
203a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i snod chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi spu gri khyer te/ bya ba byas kyang spu gri blangs nang dung bya ba yod
203a3('dul ba): ces zer nas spu gri mi ster ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spu gri bya ba byas nas ma 'chang / 
203a4('dul ba): shig/ 'chang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyu ro// spu gri ji lta ba bzhin du gdar dang ser mo gcad pa dang / slang tshang dang rkang pa brtan pa rnamaso// drug sde dag gis
203a5('dul ba): gci ba'i gan su zhugs te bya ba byas kyang / da rungayang slar 'jug zhes smras nas/ dge slong lhag pa rnams 'jug tu mi ster ro// de ltar gyur pa dge slong
203a6('dul ba): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gci ba'i gnasu zhugs te bye ba byas nas/ dge slong dag ma bgag shig/ 
203a7('dul ba): bgags na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// bshad pa'i sar yang de bzhin no// rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa brgyad pa'o// // mdor na/ 
203a8('dul ba): g.yog dang dus ston chen po dang // rnyog pa can gyi chu dang ni// phye las rdzis dang skyo ma dang // sder bsdus de bzhin bsgrags pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod
203b1('dul ba): nga'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// khyim bdag mgon med pas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na bdag gis sen mo dang dbu skra'i mchod rten
203b2('dul ba): la dus ston chen po bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na gnang gis gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i
203b3('dul ba): mchod rten la dus ston gsol cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag dus ston chen po'i tshe 'dus nas de dag rdzing bu'i nang lhung bzed rnams bkrus pa dang / gtsug lag
203b4('dul ba): na gnas pa dang / dge bsnyen dag gis kyang mar dang 'bru mar dang zho dang sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnams kyang rdzing bur bkrus pas na lhung bzed rnams dang bum ge rnam
203b5('dul ba): kyi snum dag gis chu'i steng du zhag chags par gyur te/ de la dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas chu mi 'thung ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gas
203b6('dul ba): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kho zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis dkrugs la 'thung shig/ de la the tsom ma byed cig chung kho ra khor yug tu skye bo mang po dag gi
203b7('dul ba): dkrugs pas na thams cad kyang rnyog pas gang ste/ gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang mi snang bar gyur chu tshags kyang rnyog pas 'gags nas chu mi zag pa dang / de dag la gnod par gyur
203b8('dul ba): to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na gdong gi gzugs brnyan mi snang ba der lhung
204a1('dul ba): bzed chung ngu'am snod gzhan gyis chus la shing rtog ka ta ka'i 'bras bu chug ste skad cig sdod la rtogs shig dang nges par gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang snang bar 'gyuraro// 
204a2('dul ba): de lta bu med na zan gyi chang bu chug shig de snum med pas zhig pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phye mar gyis la der chug shig/ chub tsha can du gyur nas
204a3('dul ba): dge slong dag the tsom skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste des lan tshwa'i bya ba byed nus na byin len byos la 'thung shig/ de ste bya ba byed mi nus na chus la
204a4('dul ba): 'thung shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i tshig su bcad pa dgu pa'o// / mdor na/ chu dang zho las chur gyur dang / 
204a5('dul ba): bum pa bung pa de bzhin te// lag pa bsnyal nas btung ba dang // dge tshul ba la'ang rnams bzhir bya// lhung bze da dang ni gdong dkru dang // bsod snyoms pa la rnam pa
204a6('dul ba): gnyis// rgyags dang 'bras bu me tog dag/ phongs na rung gis bza' bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
204a7('dul ba): bzhugaso// dge slong dag khron pa'i nang nas chu bcus te de dag gis btsags na/ 'bras chan gyi brul ba dang / khur ba'i dum bu dag byung // de dag the tsom skyes nas chags pa dang // 
204a8('dul ba): dum bu dag kyang 'khru bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis
204b1('dul ba): chung ste 'ong la tshogs shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag rdzing nas chu 'chu ba dang der chu'i bum pa dang / sbrang rtsa'i bum pa dag bkrus pa dang / dge slong dag gis kya
204b2('dul ba): lhung bzed snum can dag der bkru so// de dag gi snum gyis chu'i steng zhag chags par gyur/ zho'i dum bu dag kyang snang bar gyur nas/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes te ma bcus pa dang
204b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de khas zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyis chus shig/ phyi dro mi 'thung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung shig/ bum bu/ 
204b4('dul ba): dang ril ba dag gi nang du mi ldugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa der yang lugs shig dge slong drag cig lam du zhugs te dong ba dang de chu med de khyim bdag gi/ 
204b5('dul ba): snod nas 'dron pa mang po la byin pa dang / dge slong dag gi sa ma 'thungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' stsal pa/ de ste gzhan med na/ rtogs la 'thub
204b6('dul ba): shig/ de dag bum bu dang ril ba'i nang du mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig/ phyi dro ma 'thung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung shig/ 
204b7('dul ba): lam na rdo chu sgrom yod pa dang / dge slong dag the tsom skyes te chu ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rdo chu sgrom ni bkru bkru ba yin gyis/ rtogs la thub
204b8('dul ba): shig/ ril ba dang bum pa dag tu mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig/ phyi dro mi 'thung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thung
205a1('dul ba): shig de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ de bzhin du shing sgrom dang rkyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa yang stogs la 'thung shig/ phyi dro dang ril ba dang / bum bu'i nang du'ang lugs
205a2('dul ba): shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun la chu brims pa dang / de na dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa chu rgyun lhung bzed kyi nang nas ma chad pas na bzhag par gyur to/ 
205a3('dul ba): zhes smras te/ de dag gis ma blangaso// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khu ba thams
205a4('dul ba): cad kyi rgyun ni thur du 'bab kyi steng du mi 'gyur gyis 'thung la de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ de bzhin du 'o ma dang zho dang / zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang rtsa ba mo dang tsha la sogs pa la rgyas par
205a5('dul ba): brjod// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ngas rgyu zhing spyod pa las/ ba lang gi lha su phyin pa dang de dag la den chu med de/ de dag gis zho'i chu byin pa dang / dge
205a6('dul ba): slong dag the tsom skyes nas mi 'khru'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na chu med pa der zho'i chu dang dar ba
205a7('dul ba): dang bas khrus shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong dag gis ba lang rdzi la bum pa brnyas pa dang / de dag gis mar gyi bum pa dang 'o ma'i bus dag rnyed na/ de dag the tsom skyes nas ma
205a8('dul ba): blangaso// da ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum pa la rnam pa lnga ste/ bshang ba'i bum pa
205b1('dul ba): dang gci ba'i bum pa dang chang gi bum pa dang 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa'o// de la snga ma gsum po na ma bzhag pa yang ma bzhag shig/ bzhag na ni rgyang ring por 'or
205b2('dul ba): cig/ 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang mar gyi bum pa ni me'i nang du bsreg la de nas lci ba'i ri lu 'am ba lang gyi lci bas rung bar gyis la/ chu chus te de snga dro dang phyi dro yang spyod cig/ de la the tsom
205b3('dul ba): du ma byed cig/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bum pa'i nang nas chu 'thungs pa dang / bung bas zoso// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
205b4('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum bu'i nas chu ma 'thung shig/ 'thungangs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// sngar lag pasnyol la
205b5('dul ba): kha khrus te gdong chu 'thung shig/ bum bu'i kha khab med par ma bzhag shig/ de bas na ngas gnang gis/ bum pa'i kha khab chongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bum
205b6('dul ba): pa'i kha khab chongs shig ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag gis kha khab ji lta bu bcang par mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing las byas pa 'am/ rdo las byas
205b7('dul ba): pa'am/ sa las byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa snyol la chu 'thung shig ces bka' stsal na/ lam du zhugs pa dag cig la chu nyung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
205b8('dul ba): pa/ mdab ma rang lhags pa tshol la de'i nang nas 'thungs shig/ de'ang med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bag yod bzhin du shing la chags pa las 'thungs shig/ 
206a1('dul ba): de'ang med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dben pa ra 'dug la dum pa nyid nas chu 'thus shig/ gzhan gyis ma mthong ba dang mdzes pa
206a2('dul ba): gyis shig/ dge slong dag ngas phongs pa na gnang ba de ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// gling gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod
206a3('dul ba): cing dong pa las de dag gis rgyags dge tshul pa dag la bskur ba dang / de dag ma theg nas de dag gis theg pa la bskur cig ces smras pa dang dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ma bteg go// de ltar gyur
206a4('dul ba): pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ theg shig/ dge tshul ba dag ngal nas phog ste slang zhes smras pa dang / dge
206a5('dul ba): slong dag gis ma phog nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dgagis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom lda/ na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phog shig/ dge tshul
206a6('dul ba): pas ma bzung bzhin bdeg pa dang / dbab pa dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul bas ma bzung bar gdeg pa dang / dbab par ma byed cig/ dge tshul pa dag
206a7('dul ba): gis bdag cag chad de ngal bsos khyed kyis cung zhig khyer cig ces smras pa dang dge slong dag gis ma khyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tha gus chings la/ tha gu'i rtse
206a8('dul ba): mo dge tshul pas zung ste/ phyi bzhin du 'brang du chug la/ dge slong gis khyer cig/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas/ de la mi za ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
206b1('dul ba): de la the tsom du ma byed par po shig/ dge slong 'dron pa mang po lhan cig tu 'grogs te/ lam du zhugs pa dang / 'dron pa mang po dag kun pos bcom pa dang / dge tshul gyi rgyags rnams bor
206b2('dul ba): nas bros te dong ngo // dge slong gagi rgyags khyer nas de nyid na bor zhing 'dug pa dang / 'dron pa mang po dag gis 'phags pa khyed kyi rgyags ni rkun pos ma khyer ro zhes smras pa dang / dge slong
206b3('dul ba): dag gis dge tshul ba dag la deng la rgyags long ste sheg shig ces smras pa dang / de dag skrag nas 'dong du ma btub ste/ khyed nyid ci'i phyir mi 'dong nged cag rkun pos bsad mod ces smras
206b4('dul ba): pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'ad des la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdaka' stsal pa/ long la gzod dge tshul ba la byin cig
206b5('dul ba): dge slong dag gis the tsom skyes nas/ dag ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/ klung rgal bar gyur pa
206b6('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul pa dag la khyed nyid kyis khyer te rgal bar nus sam zhes dris la de ste nus shes zer na legs/ de ste mi nus so zhes zer na rgyag
206b7('dul ba): bdag cag gis khyer pa rgol cig/ de la dge slong dag gis rgyags dag pha rol tu bsgral bar bya na dge tshul bas bsgral bar bya na rtags par gyis shig/ 
206b8('dul ba): de ste dge tshul pa yang mi nus na/ dge slong dag gis rgyags pha rol tu sgrol la de'i 'og tu dge tshul pa'i yang sgral bar gyis shig/ de ste gnyi gar na dge tshul ba dang / rgyags lhan
207a1('dul ba): cig tu bskul bar gyis shig/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu bsgral pa dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas mthos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
207a2('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tsom du ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed du rmi
207a3('dul ba): shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus nas mthe bos brdabs na sgra mi bsad nas dge slong de la the tsom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 
207a4('dul ba): stsal pa/ sgyu med par lan gsum du bkru bas khrus la mthe bos brdabs na sgra gsang bar byung na/ de la the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong gzhan
207a5('dul ba): zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus te/ de lta bu gu nas zas kyi tshigs ma zhig mthong ba dang / de the tsom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la shing
207a6('dul ba): bus brung te lan gsum gyi bar du khrus la de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis yang lhung bzed gas pa zhig gis nang du khu ba dron po zhig blangs pa dang / de'i 'phro nas
207a7('dul ba): snum byung ste zhag steng du byung ba dang / dge slong ci tsom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng gi zhag zhoms la btung bar gyis shig/ dge slong cig rlung
207a8('dul ba): nid kyis btab nas des phyi dro khu ba zhig 'thungs te/ nub kar lhung bzed de'i nang du bsgom btung zhes byas pa dang / lhung bzed kyi nang du snum langs nas de'i steng du zhag cha
207b1('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong de the tsom skyes nas/ skom yang ma 'thung so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
207b2('dul ba): lag pa dang kha khrus te snum zhoms te de la the tsom du ma byed par 'thung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kha khrus shig ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag kha bkru ba mi shes nas
207b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lci ba 'am sa 'am shong gi shun phrags la sogs pa gzhan gyiso// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ 
207b4('dul ba): btsun pa ji tsam gyis na kha bkrus pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha dang rma da gnyis mtshungs te rtag tu zug pas ma 'bags par mi
207b5('dul ba): nus mod kyis/ lan gsum du kha bkrus te chu bor ba ni kha bkrus pa zhes bya'o// dge slong cig gis bsod snyoms bslangs te gnas khang du bzhag nas phyi rol tu byung ba dang / 
207b6('dul ba): khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i steng du zas shig blugs te bzhag pa dang / ji tsam bsod snyoms pa der slar 'ongs nas bsod snyoms kyi steng na zas gzhan zhig blugs par mthong ste/ de the tsom
207b7('dul ba): skyes nas zan ma zoso// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste byin len byed pa yod na byin len
207b8('dul ba): byos la zo shig/ de ste med na steng gi sar pa de logs shig tu 'or la de la the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bsod snyoms bslangs nas gnas khang du bzhag ste phyi
208a1('dul ba): rol tu song ba dang / de khyim pa zhig gis reg par mthong ste/ dge slong de the tsom skyes nas ma zos// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
208a2('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de la ci'i phyir reg ces dris la des rtsa dang sbrang ma dag gsal ba'i phyir re ces zer na byin len byos la zo
208a3('dul ba): shig/ de ste 'dod pa'i phyir re go zhes zer na de'ang phye mar gos la byin len byos te de la the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyags khyer cig ces bka
208a4('dul ba): stsal na khyim pa dang dge tshul pa dag med nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol da ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin
208a5('dul ba): pa'i bdag po spro ba skyed cig sbyin bdag kyang med na bdag nyid/ kyis slar khyer la de khyim pa dang rjes la zo shig/ de ste/ de la med na skal pa gnyisu chod la khyim pa la byin te/ 
208a6('dul ba): des khyer na ni de'i skal pa slar slongs te byin len byos la zo shig/ bdag gi skal ni de la byin cig/ de ste de ltar ma 'byor na nyi ma dang po'i tshe ni skud par 'dug shig/ phyi de nyin kyang byin len
208a7('dul ba): byed pa med na stag gi spar 'thabs gcig zo shig/ yang phyi de nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na/ stag gi spar thabs gnyis zo shig/ de ste zhag bzhi'i nyin mo yang byin len byed
208a8('dul ba): pa med na ji tsam 'drangs pa'i bar du zo shig/ de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ de ste rgyags med na 'bras bu rang lhung ba de long la gdug tshod la bab kyi bar du khyer te/ song la de ste khyim pa dang / 
208b1('dul ba): phrang na skal ba gnyi su chod la gcig ni de la byin te/ de'i skal ba slar bdag gis slongs la rung bar byos la zo shig/ bdag gis de la byin cig/ de ste ma phrad na snga dro'am phyi dro yang ru
208b2('dul ba): rung bar bya ba'i phyir rgyu med na srog dang 'bral bas the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/ de ste yang lhung ba med na shing la 'dzegs te thogs shig/ yang na sprugs la byang phyogs kyi dus su sngos
208b3('dul ba): te bo shig/ de bzhin du rtsa ba la sogs pa'ang sa las rang gis brkos te phyung la the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/ ngas khyod la phongs pa'i tshe gnang pad ma phongs pa'i tshem spyod cig/ spyad
208b4('dul ba): na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// rkyang ba'i sgo gsum dpa'i mdo'i tshigasu bcad pa bcu ste gsum pa rdzogaso// da / mdor bsdus pa ste/ sa bon bum pa rkun
208b5('dul ba): po rku ba dang // lus kyi reg pa de bzhin te// 'bras chan lan tshwa song ba dang // bu ram shing dang dgun 'bru dang / blo bur 'ongs dang gnas pa'o// mdor na/ sa bon bum
208b6('dul ba): pa shing rta glu// khur dang 'o mchong pa de bzhin te// bya rog sbrang ma btso blag las// u pa li bzhi cho ga kun shes pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i khab bya ka lan
208b7('dul ba): dka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bum pa stong gi sa bon btab pa phul pa de'i tshe dge slong dag gis de'i thog zos nas zhing yang tha bar bor te rtsa ku
208b8('dul ba): sha'i gnasu gyur to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi rol tu byung bas de dag mthong nas/ des blon po la kye sus 'di ltar zhing kun tha bar bor nas kun sha'i gnas gyur ces smras pa/ 
209a1('dul ba): dang / des lhas 'phags pa dag la bum pa stong gis bon gyis btab pa phul ba de dag gis legs par blangs pa de dag gzigs mod ces smras pa dang / rgyal pos/ 
209a2('dul ba): ci 'phags pa de dag gis thun shas su'ang ma btang ngam zhes de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
209a3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi zhing dag ni thun shas su thong shig/ dge slong dag gis thun sha su byin// zhing pas gshin pa'i rnams ni thams cad bdag cag khyer yang
209a4('dul ba): de dag gis de dag gi skal pa ma blangs pa dang / de ltar/ gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gso// dal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhing
209a5('dul ba): shas kyis skal pa long shig/ dge slong dag gis blangs te/ de nyid du bzhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ skal pa gtsug lag khang du skyos shig ces gsungs pa
209a6('dul ba): dang / sngar zhing pa nyid kyis der bskya so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon du zhing bdag gis der skyos shig/ de dag skyed pa na yang brku so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
209a7('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ba'i dge slong rnams skos shig/ shing rta'i nang du skyed pa las shing rta chag kyang dge slong gis grogs
209a8('dul ba): ma byas pa dang / khyim pa dag mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa 'phags pa 'di ni khyed kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan das kyis ma gnang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong
209b1('dul ba): ngag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shing rta las phyugs 'debs pa'i sa ma rtogs par der bskya ba dang zhing ba'i grogs kyis shig/ dge slong
209b2('dul ba): gzhan zhig na par gyur nas/ shing rta ba dag gis shing rta'i steng du zhon cig ces smras padang/ de the tsom skyes te mnon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nan shing rtal non cig/ 
209b3('dul ba): de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ gru'i nang du thun shas kyi skal bskyed pa las gru'ang chags par gyur nas dge slong dag gis grogs ma byas pa dang / khyim bdag mi dga' bar gyur nas sgra
209b4('dul ba): pa/ 'di ni khyed kyi na khyed kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/ de dag gis smras pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gdanang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
209b5('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gru'i dong ma gtogs par phul ba'i grogs dang zhing pa'i grogs gyis shig/ dge slong gzhan zhig yang klung gis
209b6('dul ba): 'gram nas song ba las na bar gyur nas mnyan pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i nang du zhugs shes smras pa dang / de the tsom skyes nang du ma zhugaso// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom
209b7('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dong ma gtogs par nang du zhugs la de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ gzhan yang khur gyis bskyas pa las
209b8('dul ba): de chad par gyur nas/ des 'phags pa 'di mar phob shig ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ma pheg/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa phog shig/ 
210a1('dul ba): dge slong dag gis phab nas slar ma btegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ji ltar dpog pa de bzhin du theg shig/ lha khang gi skang
210a2('dul ba): bor te dong ba dang / ma byin par len bdag gis brkus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du spyos shig/ dge slong dag gis sus nang du bskyab mi shes nas/ bcom
210a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khyim paso// khyim pa med na dge tshul pas so// dge tshul pa'ang med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag cag nyid kyis
210a4('dul ba): nang du skyos shig/ dge slong dag gis nang du bskyes na/ de bdag cag gis bskyas pa yino snyam nas ma zos pa dang / dade ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
210a5('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tsom ma byed par zo shig dge 'dun gyis zangs kyi nang du me cher 'bar bas 'o ma la sogs pa ni kho la rung bar
210a6('dul ba): byed pa ni/ sgor song nas bo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de phyi rol tu ma 'gro shig/ de rkyen cig byung nas phyi rol tu song na/ mgal ba dag phyir drongs shig/ 
210a7('dul ba): 'on kyang de bzhin du lud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mngag ma phyir dbyung bar gyis shig/ mdag ma phyir phyung yang lud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
210a8('dul ba): la pa/ chos gos kyis thams cad g.yobs shig/ 'on kyang lud par gyur nas bdag nyid kyis gsar bu long la dkrug par gyis shig/ dge slong dag ngas phongs pa la gnang
210b1('dul ba): pade ma 'ongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig/ spyad na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sman dag kyang dge tshul pa'am/ lha khang na gnas par dkrugs par gyis shig/ de'ang phyi rol/ 
210b2('dul ba): tusong na de'i thabs snga mo bzhin// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ tshad pa mang po gcig gis sa sa rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la sogs pa bshos la spyan drang so// de
210b3('dul ba): dag gis bshos sbyar te khongasar skyes nas ma drangs kyi bar du tshong khang du me shor te de dag me gsod du song ba dang / gdugs tshod yol la thug nas dge slong dag gis ji ltar gyur pa baH/ 
210b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi das bka' stsal pa de'i sems kyis yongasu ba nga bas na/ dge slong dag de la the tsom ma byed par bza' ba/ 
210b5('dul ba): bya'o// zos nas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyis dus su byin gyis rlobs shig/ dge 'dun gyi khong sar bya rog mchus zas la reg pa dang / dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas/ na
210b6('dul ba): ma zos so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchu'i than skor 'or la de la the tsom ma byed par
210b7('dul ba): zo shig/ dge slong dag gis lhung bzed kyi nang du bya rog dag gis reg nas de dag kha zas ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i mchu'i than skor dag la/ the
210b8('dul ba): tsacom ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni ci la'ang the tsom za ste nam gru the tsom can nam gru the tsom can zhes mi dgato/ de bshang sar 'ongs pa dang sbrang ma zhig mthong // phyis
211a1('dul ba): yang de dang 'dra bar zhig bsgos nas zas kyi steng na 'dug pa mthong ba dang / des tshe dang ldan pa dag bshangs na mthong ba'i skang ma des 'dir 'ongs te/ kha zas
211a2('dul ba): la 'phags te ma rung bar byaso zhes smras pa dang / de thos pa dang dge slong mang zhig gis zas ma zos par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
211a3('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams sbrang ma ni mthon dman kun tu rgyu ste/ des gang du reg pa de 'or la/ de la the tsom ma byed par zo shig/ dge slong dag tshon rtsi
211a4('dul ba): las byed pa na/ de dag gi sems 'khrul pas tshon rtsi'i bu dam pa yino snyam nas des dge 'dun gyi 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa dag steng du bteg ste khyer ba dang / 
211a5('dul ba): de na nam gyi tshe ngo shes pa de'i tshe na/ 'greng bzhin du boranas chag pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
211a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thang ma skas la 'dzegs pa las chung zad tsam zhig ni 'dzegs mang du lus na slar bobs la gnas gar bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog zhig/ thang ma skas la/ 
211a7('dul ba): mang du 'dzegs pa thung ngu bzeg dgos na steng du 'dzegs la gnas bde bar ma bgyel par zhog zhig/ dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas ma zos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
211a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tsom du ma byed par zo shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
211b1('dul ba): zhus pa/ btsun pa bzhag pa rnam pa du 'tshal du rung / u pa li rnams gnyis kyis te/ ngo tsha med cing bslab pa la mi mos pa dang / gang la ngo tsha yod kyang dran pa nyams pa ste/ 
211b2('dul ba): de gnyis kyi bzhag pa rung gis gnyis gzo shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byol song gi skye gnasu song ba'i sems can la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgyar re bar bya'o// 
211b3('dul ba): tshul khrims ngan pas zin pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa stong du re bar bya'o// tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa brgya phrag stong du re bar
211b4('dul ba): bya'o// phyi rol gyi drang srong 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral rabadag la sbyin pa byin na ni rnam par smin pa sa ya daphrag brgya stong du re bar bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
211b5('dul ba): bu mngon du byed par bzhugs pa la ni tshad med// rgyun tu zhugs pa la ni de bas kyang tshad medo// lan cig phyir/ 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang
211b6('dul ba): tshad med do// lan cig phyir ldog par rgyun tu zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i rgyun
211b7('dul ba): tu zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad medo// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do// dgra bcom pa la de bas kyang tshad medo// rang sangs rgyas
211b8('dul ba): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dang bdag gis dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal
212a1('dul ba): du dang ba la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag bskur ba dang dge slong dag rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen byung nas de dag gis gang du bskur bar bskur ma nuso// de dag gi nang
212a2('dul ba): nas kha cig gis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni gzhan du bsngos la gzhan du dbul bar ma byed cig ce lkug kha cig gis yang smras pa/ de la gzhan byar ci yod/ 
212a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnam pa bzhi la ni nges par
212a4('dul ba): dbul dgos te/ byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang cho 'phrul chen po dang / lha'i yul nas gshegs pa'o// 'di dag la bsngos na gzhan du
212a5('dul ba): bsngo bar ma byed cig/ de las gzhan la bsngos pa'i rkyen rnam pa de lta bus na gzhan dag tu bsngor rung gis de la the tsom du ma byed cig/ dge slong rnams ngas phongs pa'i tshe
212a6('dul ba): gnang ba de bzhin du ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig/ spyod na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong gnyis
212a7('dul ba): shig 'khrug par gyur rtsod par gyur ma thab par gyur pa de la gang med par gzung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// gnyis ga tshul khrims dang ldan
212a8('dul ba): na gang mang du thos pa'o// gnyis ga mang du thos na gang chog shes pa'o// gnyi ga chog shes na gang cher chog shes pa'o// gnyi ga cher chog shes na/ u pa li gnyi ga cher chog she
212b1('dul ba): ba las cher chog pa med mi sring // gnas med de de gnyis lta bu la ni/ 'khrug pa 'am/ rtsod pa 'am/ 'thab par gyur pa 'byung ba'i gnas ma yino// rkyang pa'i sgo'i mdo bzhi pa'i tshig su ba
212b2('dul ba): ba dang pa'o// // bam po bzhi bcu gsum pa// mdor na/ rkun gnas dang ni za ma dang // sngar 'khrugs pa la rnam pa bzhi// bslab pa byin pa
212b3('dul ba): tshul shing brims// de dag dge 'dun dbyen mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// sangs rgyas
212b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa tshu shing brim brku gnas kyi tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur ram/ u ba li mi 'gyuraro// 
212b5('dul ba): btsun pa ma ning dang za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi
212b6('dul ba): khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dag gis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pa li mi 'gyu ro// btsun
212b7('dul ba): ba sngar 'khrugs pa bzhis tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pa li mi 'gyuraro// btsun pa bslab pa byin pas/ tshul shing brims na dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u
212b8('dul ba): pa li mi 'gyur// rkyang ba'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshogasu bcad pa gnyis pa'o// / mdor na/ lus la reg dang rdul zan dang // char pa 'bab par bcang mi bya// tshang mang dang ni bsha
213a1('dul ba): gci'i sa// ma rung nas ni mi dor ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// drug sde dag gis
213a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag kyang lus la reg par bgos// rkang pa nas mgo'i bar du thang chad par dgos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan
213a3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun mal stan lus la reg par ma bsgo shig/ bgos na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag
213a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi mal stan lus/ la reg par ma sgo shig ces pa ka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
213a5('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ ka' stsal pa/ gang zag gis rdul zan gyis steng du/ shes bzhin du dal nas khad kyis bgo bar gyis shig/ drug
213a6('dul ba): sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas/ dbyar char gyi nang na blo gob med par 'dug/ de char gyis ma rung bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
213a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon la dbyar char gyi nang na bla gab med par ma 'dug shig/ 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// drug sde dag
213a8('dul ba): gis dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas tshang mang du song ba dang / de dud pas ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
213b1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon nas tshang mang du 'gro bar ma byed cig/ song nas 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag bgos
213b2('dul ba): nas bshang gci'i sar song ba dang bshang ci'i zer ma dag gis phog pa dang ma rung bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
213b3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi mal stan gyon nas bshang gci'i sar ma 'gro shig song na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyuraro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge/ 
213b4('dul ba): slong rnams dge 'dun mal stan rdol ba dang ral pa rnams gar ba dab bab tu 'dor de de dag mi spyod pa dang / de nyid ma rung dpar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gi bcom ldan 'das
213b5('dul ba): la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan chung zad rdol tam/ ral na mdor bar rdol na ni lhan pas klon cig/ ral na ni slar
213b6('dul ba): drubs shig/ de'i nang na rnyings pa dag ni khol phyung la sar bas klon cig/ de rnyings pa las rung ba yod na me mar gyi snying por gyis shig/ der yang mi rung na ba lang gi lci ba 'ams dang bsres la
213b7('dul ba): ka ba'i ser ka 'amartsig pa'i ser ka dag gi zhal zhal du gyis shig dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / yon bdag gis yun rung du spyad par 'gyur ro// rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i
213b8('dul ba): tshig su gcad pa gsum pa'o// // mdor na/ kha zas dang ste me mar dang // byug par bya dang lham rnams dang // gos dang gdugs dang shing dag dang // rtsa ba sman
214a1('dul ba): rnams tha ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// mnyan du yod pa ma / 
214a2('dul ba): bdag gzhan zhig 'dug ste/ des yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 'khor mang po'i dge slong dag cig la phulo// der 'khor drug cu dang der
214a3('dul ba): dbyar tshul du zhugs so// tshul de nas byung nas lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas dag ljongs dang phyogs gang dang gang na 'khod 'khod pa de dang de dag nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bya bar lhags nas
214a4('dul ba): de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te dong ba dang / des tshe dang ldan pa rnams nga khyim bdag 'di zhes bya bas 'gron du bos kyis/ khyed 'di nyid du 'khod ces smras
214a5('dul ba): pa dang de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po mchi'o// des smras pa/ 'o na 'khod de zas zos la deng shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ zas dang yo byad khyer
214a6('dul ba): mchis la de nyid bdag cag 'tsha lo// des 'o na legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces smras pa dang / zas dang yo byad dag khyer te dong ngo // de bzhin du kha cig gis me mar gyis
214a7('dul ba): kha cig gis ni rkang pa byug pa kha cig gis ni lham dag/ kha cig gis ni gos dag/ kha cig gis ni gdugs dag/ kha cig gis ni shing dag/ kha cig gis ni rtsa ba dang / 
214a8('dul ba): sdong bu dang lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman rnams khyer te dong pa dang / ring po ma lon par gtsug lag khang de yo byad kyis brel par gyur nas/ dge slong de khyim bdag ga na/ 
214b1('dul ba): bder song ste phyin pa dang / khyim bdag khyod kyis yo byad dag ni zad do zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa de ni dge slong dag nyung la yo byad mang du phul na ci'i phyir myur du bas zhes
214b2('dul ba): smras pa dang / de dag gis rgyas par smras pa nas/ des 'phags pa bdag gis ni de na bzhugs pa rnams kyi phyir phul na de dag gzhan du gnas la ci'i phyir gzhan du spyod
214b3('dul ba): ces nyes pa ngor brjod// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag yon bdag
214b4('dul ba): de 'phya ba ni yus te/ de bas na dge slong dag gis gzhan du gnas shing gzhan gyis khyer ba ma spyod cig/ dge slong dag gzhan du gnas la gzhan gyis spyad na de dag ji
214b5('dul ba): tsam spyad pa thams cad rin thang gzhan du phob shigarkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshig su bcad pa/ bzhi pa'o// // mdor na/ mtshan
214b6('dul ba): ma dang yang mngon mtshan dang / bar tang dag dang ri mo can// khri'u rkang pa'i ri mo can// ral tshems bya ba dbyar mo khang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod
214b7('dul ba): pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// mnyan du yod pa na mi spun gnyis shig rab tu byung ste/ de las gcig ni zhal ta pa'i gnas
214b8('dul ba): khang na 'dug/ cig ni dze ta'i tshal na'o// ji tsam na zhal ta ba de don zhig gi phyir ri brags kyi grong du song // dge slong de phu nu bo blta ba'i phyir bgo ba de bgos nas de'i thad du song ngo // 
215a1('dul ba): des dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i nang du gang zag gi dgo ba de gzhag nas gtam 'dzer cing 'khod do// de nas nor te dge 'dun gyi dgo ba zhig gyon te song // de
215a2('dul ba): nas zhal ta bde slar 'ongs nas de na bgo ba chung ngu zhig mthong ste/ des tshe dang ldan pa ci dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa grub pam zhes smras pa dang / nges smras pa/ dge ru/
